mutants.original_line: residue = np.dot(matrix, eigenvectors[:, i]) - value * eigenvectors[:, i]
mutants.mutated_line: residue = np.dot(matrix, eigenvectors[:, i]) + value * eigenvectors[:, i]

mutants.mutated_line: residue = np.dot(matrix, eigenvectors[:, i]) * (value * eigenvectors[:, i])
